name: tinkly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a light ringing sound: When I told the joke, she gave a tinkly little laugh. Somewhere a radio was playing tinkly piano music.
More examplesFewer examplesSuddenly I was aware of a tinkly sound coming from his phone.The worst thing about working in a spa is having to listen to the tinkly sounds of wind chimes all day.She sewed a small tinkly bell onto one of her slippers so that her dog would be able to hear her moving about.
